DataElement.preferredName: Product Investigation Performed Observation Outcome Identifier ISO21090.II.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information captured while conducting research on a product. EXAMPLE(S): An electrical problem in a device. The unique symbol that establishes identity of the observation result.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Product Investigation Performed Observation Outcome Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The act or process of a systematic and thorough examination; research, study; the process of inquiring into or following up, intended to develop facts.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The act or process of a systematic and thorough examination; research, study; the process of inquiring into or following up, intended to develop facts.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.
